page.title: 16RAF SWINDERBY
page.content: {Armed Forces RAF}Swinderby. { -------------------------------------- {RAF}Swinderby was built in 1940 and was,for many years,an active flying station.The School of Recruit {Training}was established here in June 1964.Since then 114000 airmen have passed out from the Station.WRAF {training}was integrated into the system in 1982,since when over 2000 {WRAF}personnel have successfully completed their basic{training}here. { RAF}and{WRAF}personnel are recruited from the whole of the United Kingdom and British Commonwealth. The intakes vary greatly in numbers depending on manpower requirements. The intakes are broken down into flights of 30 to 60 for{RAF}and 30 to 50 for{WRAF}. --------------------------------------
